issue.title: [C++] Rowwise Tutorial is out of date
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2564](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2564). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Copying code from the tutorial results in a compile error.  

Investigation shows that Maketable no longer exists:

[ARROW-1341](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1341) - [C++] Deprecate arrow::MakeTable

Attached is a working version which may be either copied into the tutorial or added as a sample.
